# Testing using XUnit 

<a name="BasicAssertions"></a>
## Basic assertions 

This method ensures that the behavior of adding a book to the shopping basket is validated
by checking the interactions with the repository and the logger.

```csharp
// Arrange
var fixture = Fixture.ShoppingBasket(setupFixture);
var sut = fixture.CreateShoppingBasket();

// Act
await sut.Add("isbn 0-434-00348-4");

// Assert
var calls = fixture.Calls;

Assert.Single(calls.repo.AddBook(arguments => arguments.isbn == "isbn 0-434-00348-4"));

var actual = Assert.Single(calls.logger.Log(t => t.logLevel == LogLevel.Debug));
Assert.Equal("Book isbn 0-434-00348-4 has been added", actual.message);
```

The configuration of the fixture is moved to an external method as shown in [Sharing configuration](AdvancedMocking.md#SharingPartsOfTheFixtureConfiguration)

<a name="DumpFixtureCallsToOutput"></a>
## Dump fixture calls to output 

```csharp
// Arrange
var fixture = Fixture.ShoppingBasket(setupFixture);
var sut = fixture.CreateShoppingBasket();

// Act
await sut.Add("isbn 0-434-00348-4");

// Dump all calls made towards the fixture mocks
foreach (var call in fixture.Calls.All())
{
    testOutputHelper.WriteLine(call.ToString());
}

// Dump calls specifically made towards the repo dependency
foreach (var call in fixture.Calls.repo.All())
{
    testOutputHelper.WriteLine(call.ToString());
}
```
